stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements best describes the passage played?

features.html: The following question is based on an excerpt of music for piano that will be played. The excerpt comprises two phrases.

choicesHtml: The second phrase is a literal repetition of the first phrase.
The first and second phrases have similar beginnings.
The second phrase is entirely different from the first phrase.
The first and second phrases form a contrasting period.
